channel.title: Uncategorized on A Morsel Of Code
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on A Morsel Of Code

item.title: PowerMock : How to test a private method
item.description: “I HAVE THE POWER!!” – I had this feeling a few days ago. I will be honest that at work I do not get time to write unit test cases for each and every piece of code that I write. Often when I do have time, I make an effort to write test cases even for the trivial piece of code blocks such as — Check if properties file is present.
